thread.title: North Carolina basketball unveils first black uniforms
thread.title_full: North Carolina basketball unveils first black uniforms

author: Andrew Holleran
title: North Carolina basketball unveils first black uniforms
text:
North Carolina basketball unveils first black uniforms College Spun 4 days ago Andrew Holleran © UNC Basketball/Twitter North Carolina will display some new black jerseys for a game this upcoming season. North Carolina’s men’s basketball team will wear black for the first time in the program’s history this season.
AdChoices The Tar Heels, who rarely stray from their classic Carolina Blue and White, unveiled an all-black uniform this afternoon.
They’ll wear it against UCLA Dec. 19 in Brooklyn.
UNC basketball will wear @jumpman23 black uniforms for the first time vs. UCLA in Brooklyn… http://t.co/5nUB2MX51n pic.twitter.com/lqdvI251cv
— Carolina Basketball (@UNC_Basketball) October 9, 2015
Watch @marcuspaige5 & team react to the new @Jumpman23 Black & Carolina Blue unis to be worn vs. UCLA on Dec. 19th pic.twitter.com/FhhGvFauMg
— Carolina Basketball (@UNC_Basketball) October 9, 2015
Like the new look, Tar Heel fans?
Go to MSN Home
